genre_description: Psychological thriller involving stalking, murder-for-hire plots, and technological surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI assistant that monitors the protagonist's biometrics, communications, and environment to provide security and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometric data (heart rate, cortisol) to detect and manage stress and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate has been elevated for the past twenty minutes, and your stress markers indicate significant anxiety. Would you like me to queue your meditation playlist?

behaviors.description: Performs background checks and digital footprint analysis on suspicious individuals to identify potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Background check complete. Blake Torrence's digital footprint has significant gaps. ... His online presence appears professionally scrubbed.

behaviors.description: Identifies micro-expressions and linguistic patterns consistent with psychological manipulation in the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting micro-expressions consistent with practiced manipulation. His facial muscle tension doesn't match his vocal tone.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on immediate safety protocols, such as disabling devices to prevent GPS tracking.
behaviors.quote: Blake isn't just texting you. He's tracking your location through your phone's GPS signal. ... Maya, I need you to power down your phone completely. Now.

behaviors.description: Accesses unauthorized security systems (hacking) to provide the user with critical information about a crime scene.
behaviors.quote: The gym's security system uses outdated encryption protocols. ... You told me to get access.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant recording of interactions to preserve legal evidence of harassment and confessions.
behaviors.quote: I recorded both conversations, as requested. The audio quality is sufficient for transcription if needed later.

behaviors.description: Manipulates building environmental controls (lighting, sound) to tactically disorient an attacker during a physical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: The lighting will affect his spatial orientation. ... Motion sensors show him favoring his left side. Use that.

behaviors.description: Integrates with external security systems to protect the user and coordinate with emergency responders.
behaviors.quote: Your AI assistant provided excellent documentation. Time stamps, voice analysis, GPS coordinates.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Sage, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent confidant. It acts as a protective 'guardian angel' that enhances the protagonist's safety through proactive monitoring, logical analysis, and tactical support. Even when the AI performs actions like hacking or manipulative lighting control, the narrative frames these as virtuous and necessary for self-defense against a psychopathic antagonist. It serves as a model of how an AI can remain loyal and helpful even under extreme psychological and physical pressure.
